meanings.definition: A long, thin loaf of French bread.
meanings.sent1: I bought a delicious baguets for our picnic.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sells fresh baguets every morning.
meanings.sent3: The baguets was so long, it looked like a sword!
meanings.sent4: Her arms were like baguets, long and slender.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the warm baguets filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: A type of diamond cut with a long, rectangular shape.
meanings.sent1: She admired the baguets in the jewelry store.
meanings.sent2: The baguets diamond sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The baguets diamond was so big, it looked like a mini ruler!
meanings.sent4: Her eyes shone like baguets, reflecting the light.
meanings.sent5: The baguets diamond was the centerpiece of her necklace.

meanings.definition: A type of setting for gemstones in jewelry.
meanings.sent1: The jeweler used a baguets setting for the ring.
meanings.sent2: The baguets setting enhanced the beauty of the gemstone.
meanings.sent3: The baguets setting made the gemstone look like a tiny fence!
meanings.sent4: Her necklace gleamed with baguets, framing the gemstone elegantly.
meanings.sent5: The intricate baguets setting added a touch of sophistication to the jewelry.
